properties.areaDesc: Madison, AL; DeKalb, AL; Marshall, AL; Jackson, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 3:22PM CST until February 10 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Huntsville AL
properties.description:
At 321 PM CST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated
indicated up to two inches of rain have already fallen over the
warned area. Hazardous travel conditions will be present in low
lying or poor drainage areas, particularly near rivers, creeks, and
streams. Many rivers have already entered action or minor flood
stage and will continue to rise overnight.

Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Northern Huntsville, Scottsboro, Bridgeport, Moores Mill,
Meridianville, Hazel Green, Henagar, Stevenson, Sylvania and
Hollywood.

Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the
warned area this evening and overnight.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

A Flood Warning means that flooding is imminent or occurring. All
interested parties should take necessary precautions immediately.

NWSheadline: A FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CST FOR JACKSON... NORTH CENTRAL MARSHALL...NORTHEASTERN MADISON AND NORTHEASTERN DEKALB COUNTIES
